text: HRdf4 <cfty <HTf gfaq5<ut {HlV / Phone: 91-11-25074100125074200 (aem 4aav #r roHf Fq4) #TA /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 7T %T MT T National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 4-5 Q 6, #aer-10, ErGT, 7 farii _ 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ 13013/3/05-06/C0 /Policy on Toll (Vol. XII) 22.06.2011 CIRCULAR NO:- NHAI/ COMMERCIAL OPERATION/ 131 Sub: Fee Notifications for PPP Projects. 1_ Publication of fee notification is a condition precedent to be fulfilled by the Authority (NHAI) as per the provisions of MCA for PPP projects. It has been  observed that fee notifications have not been published in time in cases of 4-laning PPP projects as provisioned in MCA: Adverse  view has been taken by the Honble Minister on delay in publication of fee notifications in a recent meeting presided by him. 2 To avoid such situations and to the fee notifications published in time, concerned Divisions are advised to adhere to the following procedure and time schedule s0 that proposals for publication of fee notification are submitted to the Ministry within 2 months from the date of the signing of the Contract: a_ Concerned Technical Division will submit draft fee notification proposal alongwith the concurrence of the Concessionaire to the CO Division alongwith the details in Annexure 'A' and copy of the concession agreement including schedules and annexure within 20 days from the date of the signing of the Concession Agreement; b CO Division will process the proposal within 10 on its receipt. In case any modification in the draft fee notification is envisaged, the proposal will be returned along the modifications to the concerned division for their/ Concessionaire's concurrence. Technical Division  will return the proposal to CO Division within next 15 days: CO Division will submit the  proposal within next 10 for approval of the Chairman and onward submission to Secretary, MoRT&H. 3 The   above, procedure and time   schedule, is for strict  compliance by all concerned.
